languages.text: Enemies that have taken {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from the psyker at least once suffer a −20 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to all {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance tests{/g} against the psyker until the end of combat.
languages.original_text: Противники, которые хотя бы раз получили {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урон{/g} от псайкера, до конца боя получают {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}штраф{/g} −20 при любых {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}проверках на сопротивление{/g} силам псайкера.

traits.locale_text: Enemies that have taken damage from the Psyker at least once suffer a −20 penalty to all resistance tests against the Psyker until the end of combat.
Enemies that have taken damage from the psyker at least once suffer a −20 penalty to all resistance tests against the psyker until the end of combat.

traits.locale_text: Противники, которые хотя бы раз получили урон от псайкера, до конца боя получают {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}штраф{/g} −20 при любых проверках на сопротивление силам псайкера.
Противники, которые хотя бы раз получили урон от псайкера, до конца боя получают {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}штраф{/g} −20 при любых проверках на сопротивление силам псайкера.

languages.text: 所有被灵能者造成过{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}的敌人，在抵抗灵能者的所有{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抗性检定{/g}中，都会承受-20的额外{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}减值{/g}，效果持续至战斗结束。
languages.original_text: Enemies that have taken {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from the psyker at least once suffer a −20 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to all {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance tests{/g} against the psyker until the end of combat.

traits.locale_text: 所有被灵能者造成过{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}的敌人，在抵抗灵能者的所有{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抗性检定{/g}中，都会承受-20的额外{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}减值{/g}，效果持续至战斗结束。

languages.text: Los enemigos a los que el psíquico haya infligido {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} al menos una vez sufren una {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalización{/g} de −20 a todas las {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}pruebas de fortaleza{/g} contra el psíquico hasta el final del combate.
languages.original_text: Enemies that have taken {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from the psyker at least once suffer a −20 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to all {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance tests{/g} against the psyker until the end of combat.

traits.locale_text: Los enemigos a los que el psíquico haya infligido daño al menos una vez sufren una {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalización{/g} de −20 a todas las {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}pruebas de fortaleza{/g} contra el psíquico hasta el final del combate.

languages.text: Feinde, die mindestens einmal durch den Psioniker {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} erlitten haben, erleiden bis zum Ende das Kampfes einen {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}Abzug{/g} von −20 auf alle {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}Widerstandsproben{/g} gegen den Psioniker.
languages.original_text: Enemies that have taken {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from the psyker at least once suffer a −20 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to all {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance tests{/g} against the psyker until the end of combat.

traits.locale_text: Feinde, die mindestens einmal durch den Psioniker Schaden erlitten haben, erleiden bis zum Ende das Kampfes einen {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}Abzug{/g} von −20 auf alle {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}Widerstandsproben{/g} gegen den Psioniker.

languages.text: Les ennemis auxquels le psyker a déjà infligé des {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} au moins une fois subissent une {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}pénalité{/g} de −20 pour tous les {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}tests de résistance{/g} liés aux pouvoirs du psyker jusqu'à la fin du combat.
languages.original_text: Enemies that have taken {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from the psyker at least once suffer a −20 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to all {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance tests{/g} against the psyker until the end of combat.

traits.locale_text: Les ennemis auxquels le psyker a déjà infligé des dégâts au moins une fois subissent une {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}pénalité{/g} de -20 sur tous les {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}tests de résistance{/g} liés aux pouvoirs du psyker jusqu'à la fin du combat.

languages.text: 異能者から1回以上{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を受けた敵は、戦闘終了までこの異能者に対するすべての{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抵抗判定{/g}に-20の{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}ペナルティ{/g}を受ける。
languages.original_text: Enemies that have taken {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from the psyker at least once suffer a −20 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to all {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance tests{/g} against the psyker until the end of combat.

traits.locale_text: 異能者から1回以上ダメージを受けた敵は、戦闘終了までこの異能者に対するすべての{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抵抗判定{/g}に-20の{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}ペナルティ{/g}を受ける。

languages.text: Ruhsezerden en az bir kez {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}hasar{/g} almış olan düşmanlar, ruhsezere karşı girecekleri tüm {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}direnç testlerine{/g} −20 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}ceza puanı{/g} alırlar. Etki, çatışma sonuna dek sürer.
languages.original_text: Enemies that have taken {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from the psyker at least once suffer a −20 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to all {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance tests{/g} against the psyker until the end of combat.
